name: Rabbit -- Simple Chat Fix
description:
This is the new version of the Rabbit Simple Chat Fix.
The old version is discontinued.

= Fixes issues with longer messages getting cut off on the sides.
= Makes text in chat user-selectable.
= Changes word-wrap behavior of chat.
= Fixes issue(s) with the chat container not vertically resizing properly
= Fixes placement of 'user is typing' status message
